items.title: OpenObserve - Elasticsearch Compatibility
items.desc: OpenObserve, the comprehensive open-source observability platform, has Elasticsearch compatible API support with our zPlane add-on. With this feature, you can continue to use your existing Elasticsearch tools and queries while benefiting from the high performance and cost savings that OpenObserve offers.

items.title: Enterprise Features with zPlane
items.desc: Our enterprise version offers exclusive features through the zPlane add-on, including Elasticsearch API compatibility, SAML support (on roadmap), cross-cluster search (on roadmap), and priority support with SLAs.zPlane is a collection of adapters & utilities to augment OpenObserve functionalities.

items.title: Elasticsearch API Compatibility
items.desc: Use the same queries and tools you're familiar with, while harnessing the power of OpenObserve.

items.title: Scalable & Cost-Effective
items.desc: Built with Rust, OpenObserve delivers high performance and scales up to petabytes of data.

items.title: Rich Data Functions
items.desc: Enrich, redact, and reduce data during ingestion or query time with powerful data functions.
